entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
